skills.name: Hehe! Don't Get Burned!
skills.desc: Deals Fire DMG equal to **50%** of Hook's ATK to a single enemy.

skills.name: Hey! Remember Hook?
skills.desc:
Deals Fire DMG equal to **120%** of Hook's ATK to a single enemy. In addition, there is a 100% **base chance** to inflict Burn for 2 turn(s).
When afflicted with Burn, enemies will take Fire DoT equal to **25%** of Hook's ATK at the beginning of each turn.

skills.name: Boom! Here Comes the Fire!
skills.desc:
Deals Fire DMG equal to **240%** of Hook's ATK to a single enemy.
After using Ultimate, the next Skill to be used is Enhanced, which deals DMG to a single enemy and enemies adjacent to it.

skills.name: Ha! Oil to the Flames!
skills.desc: When attacking a target afflicted with Burn, deals **Additional** Fire DMG equal to **50%** of Hook's ATK and regenerates 5 extra Energy.

skills.name: Ack! Look at This Mess!
skills.desc:
Immediately attacks the enemy. Upon entering battle, Hook deals Fire DMG equal to 50% of her ATK to a random enemy. In addition, there is a 100% **base chance** to inflict Burn on every enemy for 3 turn(s).
When afflicted with Burn, enemies will take Fire DoT equal to 50% of Hook's ATK at the beginning of each turn.

skills.name: Hey! Remember Hook?
skills.desc:
Deals Fire DMG equal to **140%** of Hook's ATK to a single enemy, with a 100% **base chance** to Burn them for 2 turn(s). Additionally, deals Fire DMG equal to **40%** of Hook's ATK to enemies adjacent to it.
When afflicted with Burn, enemies will take Fire DoT equal to **25%** of Hook's ATK at the beginning of each turn.

eidolons.name: Early to Bed, Early to Rise
Happy Tummy, Happy Body
eidolons.desc: Extends the duration of Burn caused by Skill by 1 turn(s).

eidolons.name: Don't Be Picky, Nothing's Icky
eidolons.desc:
Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

eidolons.name: It's Okay to Not Know
eidolons.desc: When Talent is triggered, there is a 100% base chance to Burn enemies adjacent to the target enemy, equivalent to that of Skill.

eidolons.name: Let the Moles' Deeds Be Known
eidolons.desc:
Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

eidolons.name: Always Ready to Punch and Kick
eidolons.desc: Hook deals 20% more DMG to enemies afflicted with Burn.
